name: Config A Planet
description:
Game Rules:

Generally, you have the ability to "config" a not-Earth planet,

where "config" means to add joins, or break things apart.

(yea you can break things)

Use your ability to save some native creatures!

Game Contents:

Start config:

1. Accelerate when disjoint;

2. Win when upgraded.

Cubbie:

1. Jump with a bad AI.

2. Will feel thirsty when away from water for too long.

3. Will feel cold when not lived in a building.

4. Die when hit hard.

Rocket:

1. Has many shapes.

2. Can upgrade. After upgrade, a disjoint will set it off.

3. Can carry infinite cubbies.

4. Make passengers invincible.

5. Break when 50% or more pixels are lost.

Building:

1. Has many shapes.

2. Can upgrade. Upgraded building is liveable when joined.

3. Will make cubbies inside invincible.

4. Break when 50% or more pixels are lost. (?)

Glowstone:

1. Upgrade many things.

Water:

1. Make cubbies not thirsty temporarily.

My Efforts:

1. I used 3000+ codes to make this game. (not including Ctrl+C Ctrl+V) 

In 2 days.

I don't know how it's possible.

2. I tested this game on a large variety of FPS, including 1 and 120. So, hopefully, no bugs.

Updates:

1.0.1: Updated conversations to a better version, and fixed some bugs.
